item.title: Day 14
item.description:

  • Outing to the Mall with Dad: Spent quality time shopping with my father, a refreshing break from the usual work routine.
  • Bought Track Pants: Picked up a pair of track pants, getting ready for the upcoming semester and workouts.

A light and pleasant day that helped reset my energy for the week ahead.
